appDesc.message: Make Pixiv light and fast. Display all images automatically.

appInfo.message:
Features:
- Changes the layout to be simple and fast.
- Blocks bloatware scripts.
- Displays all images in a gallery automatically.
- Option to fit images to screen width and height.
- Option to load master images (low-res) or original images (hi-res) by default.
- Option to use a CDN for the images.
- Enforces link colors so you know which pages you have already visited (Firefox only).

The original Pixiv layout runs a lot of scripts in your browser. This makes it unresponsive, slow and overheats laptops.
The Mini Pixiv extension blocks these scripts and changes the layout, making it lighter and faster.

The extension supports illustration pages and member pages for now. Support for additional pages are in the works.

FREE 30 DAY TRIAL. You may need to Sign in to Chrome and turn on sync for your license to be loaded.

optLoadMaster.message: Load master images (low-res) instead of original images (hi-res).

optFitImages.message: Fit images to screen width and height.

optUseCdn.message: Use a CDN for the images.

optCdnUrlInfo.message:
Eg: https://myservice.mycdn.com
The base URL for the images will be replaced by the CDN URL.

expiredText.message:
To continue using the Mini Pixiv extension for Chrome, please purchase it from the Chrome Web Store.

If you have already purchased the extension:
Sign in to Chrome browser with your Google account, turn on sync, and reload the page.
Chrome will update your license automatically.

noLicenseText.message:
Could not load the license from the Chrome Web Store.
Sign in to Chrome browser with your Google account, turn on sync, and reload the page.
Chrome will load your license automatically.

helpText.message:
To visit Pixiv without using the extension, disable or remove it from your browser.

Need help? Send email to $EMAIL$

msgTranslate.message: Help translate this extension to japanese. Please send email to $EMAIL$
